data.actual_result: It gets edited and then quickly says, "This channel doesn't have any pinned messages... yet.".
data.expected_result: The pinned messages will stay and show that it was edited.
data.short_description: If a message that is pinned gets edited really fast, it will show the pin is removed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on your Android Device. - Let a friend or bot keep editing a pinned message. [ I used giveaway bot by Jagrosh and pinned the giveaway. ] - If you look in the pins on your android device, the pin will get removed for a second. You will have to exit out the the pinned messages dialogue and press pinned messages again to see the pin.
